name: fast EMR
short_description:
fast EMR .   Developed an intuitive and easy to use
IT infrastructure for processing real medical records and images.
Providing innovative solutions that simplify the management of documents revenue and processes, helping healthcare professionals improve quality of work with patients.Accurate documentation and timely information is a of the most important issues for physicians.
 The authors have developed an intuitive and easy to
use IT infrastructure for processing real medical records and images.
Providing innovative solutions that simplify the management of documents revenue and processes, helping  health care professionals
improve quality of work with patients.
The increased attention to security in the fast_EMR
provides clinicians and administrators to high protection of physical health records.
summary: fast EMR Developed an intuitive and easy to use  IT infrastructure.
